maven2-moduleset.description: 负责打包，负责打所有的平台

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo '' echo '' echo '================= platform base =============' cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-base/server/ sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-base/server/dockerBuild-bgytonghu.sh sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-base/server/dockerBuild.sh
echo '' echo '' echo '================= platform alarm =============' cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-alarm-linkage/server/ sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-alarm-linkage/server/dockerBuild-bgytonghu.sh sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-alarm-linkage/server/dockerBuild.sh
echo '' echo '' echo '================= platform schedulejob =============' cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-schedule-job/server/ sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-schedule-job/server/dockerBuild-bgytonghu.sh sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-schedule-job/server/dockerBuild.sh
echo '' echo '' echo '================= platform log =============' cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-sys-log/server/ sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-sys-log/server/dockerBuild-bgytonghu.sh sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-sys-log/server/dockerBuild.sh
echo '' echo '' echo '================= platform upperapp =============' cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-upperapp/server/ sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-upperapp/server/dockerBuild-bgytonghu.sh sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/platform-services-parent/iot-platform-one-service/iot-platform-upperapp/server/dockerBuild.sh
echo '' echo '' echo '================= iot-license =============' cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/iot-license/ sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/iot-license/dockerBuild-bgytonghu.sh sh /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/springcloud-iot-2020/iot-license/dockerBuild.sh
